== Technical specifications for Ubuntu 8.10 Server Edition ==

This document is for Ubuntu 8.10. For other releases please visit the <nowiki>[[..-|technical specifications overview]]</nowiki> page.

The minimal requirements of version 8.10 have not been modified since  version 8.04.  You can see a <nowiki>[[..-new|summary of all changes since 8.04]]</nowiki>. As a regular release, 8.10 benefits of an 18 month <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/products/whatisubuntu/serveredition/benefits/lifecycle|lifecycle]]</nowiki>.   

The following is a selection of the common packages packages that are  fully maintained on Ubuntu Server Edition 8.10. 

=== Kernels ===
* Default    2.6.27-server    Tickless, No Preemption, Deadline I/O,  PAE, 100Hz    
* JeOS    2.6.27    Stripped down kernel for Virtualization

=== Web ===
* Apache    2.2    event/prefork/worker/dev
* Tomcat 6
